de.frauas.jdemandmodel.appliance

Class StorageHeater

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.frauas.jdemandmodel.appliance.Appliance
      • de.frauas.jdemandmodel.appliance.StorageHeater

  • public class StorageHeater
extends Appliance
    A storage heater is a special appliance, where the probability of being turned on depends on the month of the year and the time of day.
    Author:
    lukas

    • Method Detail

      • checkStartEvent

        protected boolean checkStartEvent(int activeOccupancy)
        In this method, it is decided whether the storage heater should be turned on. The following conditions must be fulfilled: It only ever is turned on at 00:30:00 each day. In months 1 to 4 and 10 to 12 the probability is 1, in months 5 and 9 it's 0.5 and in months 6 to 8 it is 0.
        Overrides:
        checkStartEvent in class Appliance
        Parameters:
        activeOccupancy - the current active occupancy of the dwelling
        Returns:
        true, if the appliance should be turned on, otherwise false.
